title: Diamond Peacock Inspired Pendant - Modern Mangalsutra
features: Featuring a stylized peacock feather motif, this pendant incorporates a modern take on traditional South Indian design. The delicate leaf-like arrangement is intricately set with sparkling diamonds. The bail design features an elegant, spiraling motif, adding to the pendant's refined appearance.
description: This modern pendant embodies the rich South Indian heritage. Meticulously crafted from 18K rose gold and adorned with brilliant cut diamonds, the pendant showcases exceptional brilliance and timeless appeal. This piece is a symbol of grace and beauty, perfect for adding a touch of modern elegance to any ensemble.
